mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS_LIST( ORDER_LIST_NO , ORDER_NO , ORDER_DATE , PRICE , QUANTITY ) VALUES ( SEQ_ORDER_LIST_NO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_ORDER_NO.CURRVAL , SYSDATE , #{price} , 1(나중에 JS에서 변수값 가져와야할듯..) )
mapper.select: SELECT P.NAME , P.PRICE , P.CAPACITY , A.ADDRESS , O.ORDER_NO , O.MEMBER_NO , O.ORDER_DATE , O.QUANTITY FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON O.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO JOIN ADDRESS A ON A.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO
